title.rendered: Memory Foam Round Baby Bolster for Side Support (22×5″) – White

content.rendered:
MULTIPURPOSE PILLOW– 

The Rise and Shine baby bolsters can be used in bed, stroller, cradles, prams, cots Etc. It is Easy to carry product as it is very light weighted and does not change shape or size when pressed.

 

MEMORY COMFORT® FOAM: 

Made up of imported materials these memory foam bolsters bring you the most comfortable sleep. As the name suggests Memory foam has the ability to remember the original shape, it slowly returns back to it after being compressed. The pillow is made up of 100% pure Visco-Elastic memory foam.

 

TEMPERATURE SENSITIVE MATERIAL: 

It allows our body heat to activate the molding process so that it gives us personalized fit. The climate control features also does not allow the bolsters to become hard in winters.

 

SPECIAL FEATURES:

  • Better Support and Sleep- This bolster provides optimum comfort and support to new born babies.
  • Retains original shape after each use, Unlike Polyfill/Cotton bolsters our bolsters will not sag.
  • Helps in avoiding incorrect sleeping postures.
  • Total Value for Money

 

INNER COVER: 

We provide our bolsters with two layers of jersey. The basic being a soft material to protect the bolster.

 

PREMIUM SOFT OUTER COVER: 

The super soft premium printed fabric as our Outer Cover for the Pillows is gentle on baby’s skin. It is Antiallergenic, eco-friendly and Easy to Care. The bolster comes with a removable cover which is easy to remove and wash.

 

WE ASSURE: 

Our Bolsters are made up of 100% filler-free foam. We have tested our bolster in lab and have a strict quality check before it is dispatched. Our bolsters are of high density foam so be assured that it will be your companion for long. We provide One year limited warranty. Please check our Warranty section.

excerpt.rendered: Rise & Shine’s Memory Foam Baby Bolster is one of the most luxurious baby product. Specially designed for Baby, these Bolsters are sized such a way that it Provides a safe environment and support for baby to sleep. It keeps the baby Safe while sleeping. It provides protection for the baby rolling and hitting the rails or falling off the mattress when sleeping.
